list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add LDAP configuration key and update workspace annotations
Added `connect_abort_timeout` to the LDAP configuration documentation, providing details on timeout behavior for establishing connections. Updated workspace configuration metadata to reflect changes, improving alignment with recent branding and UI refinements.

task.summary: Default task
Updating documentation
Update documentation WIP
Update documentation WIP

Update configuration documentation
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the documentation. The changes encompass sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains among others. The update improves comprehension and usability.

Update documentation for workspace and Lua support
Detailed configuration attributes have been added to the workspace.xml and lua-support.md documentation. The update includes sections addressing Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, thus improving comprehension and usability of these features. This discussion provides a more thorough understanding of settings and configurations, facilitating more effective use of the system.

Updated workspace documentation and Lua support
Expanded the lua-support.md and workspace.xml documentation with detailed configuration attributes enhancing comprehension and usability. The updates cover sections including Redis, realtime_blackhole_lists, brute_force, and relay_domains, providing an in-depth understanding of system settings and configurations. Increased local task counter to mirror the updates.

Refactor documentation to focus on LDAP and Lua support
The documentation has been revised to focus solely on LDAP and Lua for configuration, querying, and database type handling. Some sections that mentioned SQL support have been updated to talk only about LDAP or Lua. This revision provides clearer instructions for setting up and using LDAP and Lua with Nauthilus.

Update Docusaurus dependencies and remove Redis documentation
The Redis documentation file has been deleted, leading to the adjustments of the sidebar positions in other files. Docusaurus dependencies in package-lock.json have been updated to the latest versions.

Update Docusaurus configuration, docs, and workspace.xml
Expanded the documentation including new sections for server, front end, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown to include more detailed subsections and updated workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Update Docusaurus configuration and dependencies
Updated Docusaurus to version 3.5.2 and added new documentation sections for server, frontend, and HTTP3 support. Refactored markdown with more detailed subsections and modified workspace.xml to track additional documentation files and GitHub settings.

Fix references in docs and update workspace settings
Corrected REST API paths in nginx-mail-plugin and rest-api docs to use consistent routes. Updated .idea/workspace.xml configurations to track changes in documentation files and incremented the localTasksCounter value.

Update workspace tracking and dovecot Lua script improvements
Added .md files to workspace tracking for better documentation oversight. Enhanced dovecot Lua script for more robust error handling and configuration, including added support for json-based authentication and improved HTTP request logic. Updated REST API documentation to reflect new endpoints and configuration details.

Update documentation and workspace settings
Added new sections to docs for community support, features like SSO in Keycloak, and updates to Lua configuration, including Redis custom pools and Prometheus integration. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to track these changes for improved documentation oversight. Enhanced clarity and accessibility of existing documentation with additional examples and links.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation with new server configurations, including `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Enhanced Lua functionality with features like Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring support. Improved clarity and consistency across documentation with examples, links, and updated workspace settings.

Add new configuration sections and Lua script features
Updated documentation to include new server configurations, such as `disabled_endpoints`, `http_client`, and `backend_server_monitoring`. Improved Lua scripts with support for Redis custom pools and backend server monitoring. Enhanced documentation clarity and consistency with updated examples, links, and workspace tracking adjustments.

Refactored Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been split into many smaller pages to enhance the user experience.

Add pan-zoom support for Mermaid diagrams and refine layout
Introduced `panzoom` integration to allow interactive zooming and panning for Mermaid diagrams, enhancing user interactivity. Updated CSS styles and added a dynamic description for usability. Refined project dependencies, including `panzoom`, and adjusted DOM observation for rendering Mermaid containers effectively.

Update dependencies and refine documentation warnings
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia-related dependencies to improve stability and performance. Replaced deprecated `:::warn` syntax with `:::warning` in documentation. Enhanced project configuration for better maintainability and interaction features.

Update dependencies and improve Lua API documentation
Upgraded Docusaurus and Algolia dependencies for better performance and stability. Enhanced Lua API documentation by adding new functions, restructuring sections, and introducing a "Soft whitelists" page. These changes improve usability, interactivity, and maintainability.

Update Lua API docs and improve workspace configuration
Enhanced the "Soft Whitelist" Lua API documentation by adding spacing for improved readability. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes in dependencies and task summaries, ensuring consistency and better project management.

Revise Lua API docs and update workspace configuration
Enhanced the "Soft Whitelist" Lua API documentation for better readability and updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect configuration changes and task summaries. Introduced an improved Mermaid diagram showcasing application communication paths in `overview.md` and added a TOC for easier navigation. These updates improve clarity, maintainability, and usability across the documentation and workspace setup.

Refactor Lua API docs and update workspace configuration
Improved "Soft Whitelist" Lua API documentation for readability and updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes in dependencies and task summaries. Enhanced `overview.md` with a better Mermaid diagram and added a table of contents for easier navigation. These updates improve maintainability, clarity, and usability across project documentation and configuration.

Refactor Homepage features and improve documentation.
Added the "Postfix" feature to HomepageFeatures and revised descriptions for "SSO" and database support to enhance clarity. Updated Lua API docs, workspace configuration, and Docusaurus tagline to reflect expanded functionality and improve maintainability. These changes ensure better usability and accuracy in both features and documentation.

Refactor Prometheus Lua API docs and improve workspace setup
Revised and expanded the Prometheus Lua API documentation, adding detailed examples for metrics like gauges, counters, summaries, and histograms. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect project changes and task summaries for better organization. These updates enhance clarity, maintainability, and usability across the documentation and project configuration.

Refactor Prometheus Lua API docs and update workspace setup
Revised Prometheus Lua API documentation with clearer terminology and detailed examples for gauge, counter, summary, and histogram vectors. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to incorporate project changes and improve task tracking. These changes enhance documentation clarity, maintainability, and project organization.

Add Redis Sorted Set API methods in Lua documentation
Introduced comprehensive documentation for Redis Sorted Set methods in the Lua API, including `zadd`, `zrange`, `zrangebyscore`, and others. These additions describe syntax, parameters, return values, and examples to enhance developer understanding. Updated workspace settings to reflect related changes.

Add Redis Sorted Set API methods in Lua documentation
Documented Redis Sorted Set methods (`zadd`, `zrange`, `zrangebyscore`, etc.) with detailed syntax, parameters, return values, and examples. These additions aim to enhance developer understanding and API usability. Updated workspace settings to align with the new documentation changes.

Add commercial support info and improve UI and docs
Added a new card to highlight Nauthilus commercial support on the homepage, along with an email contact link. Updated documentation to include deprecated features and clarify existing features. Improved the Docusaurus UI with theme updates, additional syntax highlighting, and color adjustments for better accessibility.

Deprecate German impressum, add legal and privacy docs
Replaced the German "Impressum" with English legal notice and privacy policy pages for better accessibility and compliance. Enhanced Redis Lua API documentation and updated configuration options, introducing new features like multiple replica addresses and brute force learning. Made UI and documentation more user-friendly with updated navigation, terminology, and theme improvements.

Remove redundant TOC entries from documentation.
Removed auto-generated Table of Contents (TOC) blocks from multiple documentation files to enhance readability and avoid duplication with existing navigation structures. This change improves clarity and aligns with standard documentation practices.

Update documentation and metadata for Nauthilus
Revised commercial support contact info in docs/intro.md to use a mailto link for clarity. Enhanced metadata in docusaurus.config.js with Open Graph and Twitter tags for better SEO and social sharing. Simplified the homepage title in src/pages/index.js for cleaner display.

Update logo_nauthilus.png
Replaced the existing logo with a new version to reflect updated branding. This ensures consistency across all visual assets.

Update logo, refine CSS, and simplify homepage UI
Replaced the logo with a new version to align with updated branding. Adjusted CSS by modifying padding for better layout consistency. Simplified the homepage UI by removing redundant buttons for a cleaner user experience.

Add LDAP configuration key and update workspace annotations
Added `connect_abort_timeout` to the LDAP configuration documentation, providing details on timeout behavior for establishing connections. Updated workspace configuration metadata to reflect changes, improving alignment with recent branding and UI refinements.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation for Nauthilus was entirely removed from the repository. This may indicate deprecation or migration of Lua capabilities, and users should consult other resources for information on Lua integration.

Remove Lua support documentation.
Deleted extensive documentation on Lua support as it is no longer relevant or necessary for the project. This cleanup reduces repository bloat and ensures that only essential documentation is maintained.

Remove Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been deleted as part of repository cleanup. This might indicate deprecation or migration of Lua-related features, pending further updates on functionality changes.

Remove Lua support documentation
The Lua support documentation for Nauthilus has been completely removed. This change suggests that Lua-related functionality may no longer require dedicated documentation or might have been deprecated. Ensure compatibility or reference alternative resources if required.

Refactored Lua support documentation.
The Lua support documentation has been split into many smaller pages to enhance the user experience.

Add pan-zoom support for Mermaid diagrams and refine layout
Introduced `panzoom` integration to allow interactive zooming and panning for Mermaid diagrams, enhancing user interactivity. Updated CSS styles and added a dynamic description for usability. Refined project dependencies, including `panzoom`, and adjusted DOM observation for rendering Mermaid containers effectively.

Enhanced overview documentation with a TOC, refined diagrams, and added related project links for better clarity and usability.

These updates improve clarity, maintainability, and usability across the documentation and workspace setup.

These updates improve maintainability, clarity, and usability across project documentation and configuration.

These changes ensure better usability and accuracy in both features and documentation.

These additions describe syntax, parameters, return values, and examples to enhance developer understanding. Updated workspace settings to reflect related changes.

Documented Redis Sorted Set methods (`zadd`, `zrange`, `zrangebyscore`, etc.) with detailed syntax, parameters, return values, and examples. These additions aim to enhance developer understanding and API usability. Updated workspace settings to align with the new documentation changes.

Improved the Docusaurus UI with theme updates, additional syntax highlighting, and color adjustments for better accessibility.

Remove redundant TOC entries from documentation.
Removed auto-generated Table of Contents (TOC) blocks from multiple documentation files to enhance readability and avoid duplication with existing navigation structures. This change improves clarity and aligns with standard documentation practices.

Update license link and remove redundant TOC entries.
Replaced the license file link in `docs/intro.md` with a direct URL to the GPLv3 license for improved accessibility. Removed redundant auto-generated Table of Contents (TOC) entries from documentation to enhance readability and align with standard practices. Updated workspace settings accordingly.

Revised commercial support contact info in docs/intro.md to use a mailto link for clarity. Enhanced metadata in docusaurus.config.js with Open Graph and Twitter tags for better SEO and social sharing. Simplified the homepage title in src/pages/index.js for cleaner display.
